price: Wͻkaa sε: “Nokorε mu, saa nnipa mmienu yi yε ntafowayifoͻ mmienu a wͻpεsε wͻde wͻn ntafowa no bɛtu mo fri mo asaase soͻ na wͻyi mo amammerε pa no fri hͻ.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَٰنِ لَسَٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخۡرِجَاكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِمَا وَيَذۡهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلۡمُثۡلَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū in hādhāni lasāḥirāni yurīdāni an yukh'rijākum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihimā wayadhhabā biṭarīqatikumu al-muth'lā
